title: New Swain is amazing and the team who worked on him should feel amazing too!
body:
Through a combination of the changes to his kit and the awesome new items, Swain feels more like a real champion than he ever has. The neat buff to his passive mana restore, as well as the one-point wonder of E (which was a huge surprise for me reading over the patch notes) and new ticking mechanic on R and Q are all awesome changes that I feel fix a lot of gripes I had playing him over 4 years, while still keeping him the same champion identity-wise. 
Not only that, the new items break up the monotony of the old Swain build (RoA into Zhonyas) with the GLP item, new, mana-giving Morellos, and all the other stuff, really is wonderful. 
I just have to say thank you for making him feel fun to play again. I picked Swain up a good 4 or so years ago, and since then he's felt incredibly static in playstyle. Thanks for changing that, and not screwing it up :)
